description:
Rataleone`s latest money-spinner is a project to open a copper mine on Grey Wolf territory in Northern America. Meanwhile, a vicious rogue wolf is running amok, terrorizing the townspeople. Taking advantage of the locals` superstitious fear of the wolves, the Rats have set a cunning trap to discredit the amiable beasts and drive them out of their habitat. Our heroes uncover the plot and foil Rataleone once again.
Source: bcdb.com
